summary: Completed comprehensive testing of plays888.co O/U line scraper and live lines integration. Backend APIs working perfectly with 100% success rate. Frontend fully functional with proper live data display, toggle functionality, and user interactions. All requested features from the review are working correctly.

design_issues.issue: Minor DOM attachment issues when rapidly switching between NBA/NHL tabs
design_issues.impact: Does not affect functionality, just a React re-rendering timing issue

passed_tests: POST /api/scrape/totals/NBA - Successfully scrapes 14 NBA games from plays888.co
POST /api/scrape/totals/NHL - Successfully scrapes 13 NHL games from plays888.co
POST /api/opportunities/refresh?use_live_lines=true - Fetches live NBA O/U lines
POST /api/opportunities/nhl/refresh?use_live_lines=true - Fetches live NHL O/U lines
Frontend Live Lines toggle visibility and functionality
Frontend data source indicator shows 'plays888.co (Live)' when live data is used
TODAY'S PLAYS section displays with proper color coding (blue=OVER, orange=UNDER)
Refresh Data button triggers live data fetch
Games table displays proper team names and totals from plays888.co
Betting logic validation with updated rules (OVER: 1-12.5, UNDER: 17.5-30)
Color coding throughout UI (blue rows for OVER, orange rows for UNDER)
